full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal

### High-Performance Freeze-Dryer with Nucleation

The National Research Council Canada is soliciting proposals for the supply and delivery of a high-performance freeze-dryer with nucleation for the Microbial Fermentation Department at the Centre for Research in Human Health Therapeutics.

#### Contract Information

* **Contract Reference Number:** cb-110-71545390
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58247
* **Notice Publication Date:** 2024-02-26
* **Tender Closure Date:** 2024-04-09 (14:00:00)
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-09-30

#### Scope of Work

The successful bidder will be required to supply and deliver a high-performance freeze-dryer with nucleation capable of meeting the specific requirements of the Microbial Fermentation Department. The equipment must be designed to optimize the freeze-drying process and ensure the quality of the end product.

#### Locations of Opportunity and Delivery

The tender opportunity is open to contractors based in Quebec, with the exception of the National Capital Region. The delivery location is also in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.

#### Contracting Entity

The Contracting Entity is the National Research Council Canada, located at 1200, Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada.

#### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Kacendra Dion, Procurement Specialist, at (438) 324-8125 or via email at [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca).

### Documents

Available tender documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buy and Sell website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

* Tender Notice: 23-58247
* Request for Proposal: 23-58247 Q&A
* Request for Proposal: 23-58247 Q&A (Vol. 2)
* Request for Proposal: 23-58247 Q&A (Vol. 3)
* Notice of Product Presentation: 23-58247
* Request for Proposal: 23-58247 RFP (English)
* Request for Proposal: 23-58247 RFP (French)
